game.name: Shadows of the Ruins
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능
game.shortDescription: Venture yourself into the ancient Ruins of a fallen evil empire in order to loot treasures and save your village from eternal poverty. But behold, there is MORE than traps and MONSTERS waiting for you in this dungeon...
